sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>eternity</radical> radical and the <kanji>eternity</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: How long is an <kanji>eternity</kanji>? Just look at this little <reading>a</reading>corn (<ja>えい</ja>) and ask. The acorn starts small but it grows into a huge tree and can live for all eternity by dropping more acorns to create more trees. Its acorn line will live on forever!
readingInfo: It's the miracle of eternal life!
